item.description:
Ideas, creativity, and story are an essential start to any successful digital project. This workshop will introduce creativity exercises, methods for refining concepts, and steps to translate ideas into design documents.

Participants will receive a handout of notes, and will be encouraged to share other techniques during a group discussion. One or more project ideas chosen in advance will be presented to the group, and all members will have the opportunity to join in an informal concept development session.

The $5 workshop fee will be used to offset the monthly meetup group costs. Number of participants will be limited to 6.

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Concept Development Workshop
